text: Is a very nice place to stopby. Mai, Hannah and Ranjan are very nice and always come by and do the table touch. Thank you so much for the hospitality!
The staff are exceptionally prompt and very warm and friendly especially Mai! Flying from T3 always is a memorable experience for that one stop at Harry’s !
It was cosy and comfort ambience to dine in this restaurant. The food and service are fantastic. Chicken masala with pita bread is good.

Had a few drinks while waiting for our connecting flight.
Great tap selection, and they have a further range of drinks by the bottle!
Beer out of the taps is average- the Tiger tasted off, and the Guinness wasn’t up to standard.
Overall, pretty good place to relax given the prices aren’t extreme to enjoy a beer!
Tiger Pint 14SING
The women bar staff are very good, they know how to serve fast, ask customers what they want, keep eye contact with customers. Food on the other hand- chicken skewers? I think not
